categories: Category:Jedi trainees of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Lena Missa was a Jedi Padawan during the Clone Wars. A female Chagrian, she was Tallisibeth Enwandung-Esterhazy's friend. She wielded a blue lightsaber. She made it to the Round of Eight during the Jedi Temple Apprentice Tournament when she was forced to yield after being defeated by Whie Malreaux.
